alert.note: Alert for Clinton (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 7:45PM CST until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Kaskaskia River at Vandalia. Kaskaskia River at Carlyle TW. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kaskaskia River at Carlyle TW. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Sunday the stage was 424.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM CST Sunday was 424.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady above flood stage at 424.1 feet. - Flood stage is 423.5 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Kaskaskia River Carlyle TW 423.5 424.1 Sun 7 pm 424.1 424.1 424.2 424.2 424. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
